articles.title: BAT starts $2 billion buyback following its ITC stake sale - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The maker of Lucky Strike cigarettes, Vuse vapes and Velo nicotine pouches said Monday that net proceeds of the ITC stake sale totaled £1.57 billion and that it will buy back as much as £1.6 billion of its own shares this year and next.
articles.content:
British American Tobacco Plc. started a £1.6 billion ($2 billion) buyback program after selling part of its stake in Indias ITC Ltd.
